trans-unit.source: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.
In the course of composition, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports.
If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors.
Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer.

Which behavior occurs depends on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> attached to the export and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.
Both of which will contain a value from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeration.
If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import.
The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties.
Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Any or none specified.
Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Shared
Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies NonShared
Any
A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
Shared
A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
The export will not be considered a match for the import.
NonShared
A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
The export will not be considered a match for the import.
A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.

Specifies that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> will use the most appropriate <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref> for the part given the current context.
This is the default <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>.

By default, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> will use <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared"></xref>, unless the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> or importer requests <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared"></xref>.

Specifies that a new non-shared instance of the associated <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> will be created by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> for every requestor.

Specifies that a single shared instance of the associated <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> will be created by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> and shared by all requestors.
